title: Raphael v Picasso reflect values of their eras

content.question: Directions: The suggested planning and writing time for the question below is 35 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your answer. Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Contrast the ways in which the paintings shown express the artistic and intellectual concerns of the eras in which the works were created.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
